!

integer, allocatable :: A(:)

           i = i +1

       i = i +1

   else

           i = i +1

       end do

       i = i +1

   end if

end do

! Second step

! Format to 10 decimal places

       cnt = cnt + tmp

   else

       tmp =0

   end if

end do

! Output the final count

end program main
